title: Oriental Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°C (480°F) or as hot as your oven goes. If using a pizza stone, place it in while preheating.
Slice the planted into thin strips and sauté in a hot pan with a drizzle of sesame oil until slightly caramelized, about 3-4 minutes.
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface. Transfer to a baking sheet or pizza peel.
Spread a thin layer of hoisin sauce or teriyaki sauce as the base instead of tomato sauce.
Top with the sautéed planted, sliced bell peppers, red onion, and mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 8-12 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbling.
Remove from oven and top with fresh cilantro, sliced scallions, and a drizzle of sriracha mayo.
